Mood: Why do you feel that way?
Sleep: How many hours did you sleep?
Gratitude: What are you thankful for right now?
Meal: What was the quality of this food?
Task: What is the name of the task?
Log: What do you want to log?
Exercise: What kind of exercise did you do?
What was the quality of this exercise?
Entertainment: What entertainment are you consuming today?
Ideas: What idea do you want to quick log?
